descriptionHtml:
[center][size=6][color=#38761D]Snake Bite[/color]

[color=#d0e0e3][size=4]Hi there, after I made this I thought it would look good with a greenish glow (you know sort of like poison).

Well I found the glow but it's not poison, instead it's silent moon enchantment. Hope ya' all like it..or them..Cheers

[/size][/color][/size][color=#d0e0e3][size=4]

Craftable: Yes, at any forge under the Steel category.

Tempered: Yes, at any smithy wheel.

Damage: About the same as daedric dagger

Dual Sheath redux compatible,yes..as you can see from the screenshot,  just run the patcher.

Screen shot: Armor used is Vampire Rogue Armor by TheBlitz77 http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61546/?

 
Installation:
-Extract the contents(including folders) into your Skyrim game folder. Or use mod manager of choice.

pixelgamerch has added this mod in 1of his vids [/size][/color]
https://youtu.be/0WtYVBpaRjc

..Thank you pixel :)[color=#d0e0e3][size=4]

Any questions and or comments are welcome. Thank you.

Edit:
The files are kind of big, the sheath was an after thought and i used a high res snake skin texture.
1K version now availible
Also added an option for a smaller pommel at the top of the handle,
just replace the nif files in the meshes folder.

And also a 2nd set of maps, if you find it to big of a download I could retex the sheath..let me know ok :)[/size][/color][/center]
author: tarll
